## News Review for arco

# Arco News Review

## Executive Summary

Based on the available sources, no technology company or IDP (Intelligent Document Processing) vendor developments were identified for Arco during this review period. The only reference found relates to a French animated film titled "Arco" directed by Ugo Bienvenu, which is scheduled for screening at the 2026 Palm Springs Film Festival as part of their Family Day programming on January 11, 2026, at the Mary Pickford Theater ([source](https://www.rogerebert.com/festivals/palm-springs-film-festival-announces-2026-lineup)). This entertainment industry reference appears unrelated to any business technology vendor operating under the Arco name in the IDP or broader enterprise software market.

## Individual Articles

### Article 1: Palm Springs Film Festival Announces 2026 Lineup

**Source:** [View Full Article](https://www.rogerebert.com/festivals/palm-springs-film-festival-announces-2026-lineup)

## Summary

The article announces the 2026 Palm Springs Film Festival lineup, which includes a French animated film titled 'Arco' directed by Ugo Bienvenu as part of the Family Day programming. The film will be screened for free at the Mary Pickford Theater on January 11, 2026, alongside other family-friendly content. This appears to be an entertainment industry reference unrelated to any IDP software vendor named Arco.
